alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Moore; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Moore, southeastern Montgomery and northeastern Richmond Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 455 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a scattered, strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Pinehurst, or 11 miles west of Southern Pines, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southern Pines, Carthage, Pinehurst, Whispering Pines, Pinebluff, Foxfire, Candor, Taylortown, Norman and Derby. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
